title: Sofie Soft Tampon: Drive Ryokou-hen
title_japanese: ソフィソフトタンポン　ドライブ旅行篇
synopsis: An animated television advertisement for Sophie brand soft tampons. A woman has a long road trip ahead of her with her friends and the product helps her stay leak-proof when she doesn't have the ability to frequently stop at the restroom. NOTE FOR MODS: can you make a new studio listing for Liberty Animation Studio. http://liberty-anime.co.jp/ https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/company.php?id=10757 they are the ones who made this anime. As well as https://myanimelist.net/anime/37792/Hanasu_na%E2%98%85 https://myanimelist.net/anime/37801/Gori_Papa_Ikka_no_Nougyou_wa_Omoshiroi https://myanimelist.net/anime/22093/Mayonaka_wa_Junketsu https://myanimelist.net/anime/34711/Benpiyaku_Colace and a few others. I'd like to add more entries this studio made to the database. They have a very long work history...but I'm honestly going to only add ones that have a surviving video online which so far is surprisingly not a lot. I guess that makes sense since they're mostly commercials and who saves those to post on youtube?
